Description: Imported guitar 7 years ago in 2011, Gold & Chrome Rolex style hardware. LP Standard Supreme comes with mother of pearl lettering on headstock. Ever wanted an amazing guitar that didn't cost 4,000.00 , but also didn't sound like a cheap import? You can now have a guitar that sounds and looks like the real thing. How? Get a beautiful flamed carved figured maple top Guitar, strip it down of all imported hardware to body and neck. Install all Genuine Gibson pots, wiring, bridge, tailpiece, and genuine vintage Sprague BumbleBee capacitors. Refit and engineer the neck to install Grover tuners. Amazing guitar tone with Gibson USA BurstBucker Rhythm Pro - neck, BurstBucker Pro bridge pick up. Have it professionally checked and set up. The Guitar has been stored in Hard shell for most of its years. Has a few finish swirls and some light scratches. However, Looks fabulous, Sounds amazing, and plays as it should. All guitars feel different to different people, so I can't say its for you. For the price, you can love it. Comes in beautiful locking imported Hard Case. Tobacco Burst figured Maple top Standard binding and Finish Standard Supreme headstock with mother of pearl lettering / Standard truss rod cover Neck BurstBucker Pro Rhythm Bridge BurstBucker Pro Bridge Gold Grover tuners Installed Black Pick GuardPearlized TrapezoidsGold custom knobs No Claim is made that this used imported guitar is a Gibson USA.
Title: 2011 LP Standard Supreme Guitar Gibson
ConditionDescription: Used in excellent condition with some swirls and light scratches.
